snippet: The mayor of Toronto quietly exited his home and entered rehab after a video surfaced that appeared to show him smoking crack.
abstract: Toronto Mayor Rob Ford, who acquired international notoriety in 2013 for his drug use, leaves home, apparently for rehab; new video has surfaced in which Ford appears to be smoking crack.
lead_paragraph: The mayor of Toronto quietly exited his home and entered rehab after a video surfaced that appeared to show him smoking crack.

headline.main: Caught Again on Camera, Rob Ford Leaves for Treatment
headline.print_headline: Caught Again on Camera, Mayor Leaves for Treatment
